This program is a simple 3D model viewer, that demonstrates how to load
and display a 3DS object using the new 'Model' class.
  James, 11/12/03

Instructions:
  1. Press 'L' and choose a 3D Studio (.3ds) file to view.
  2. Left-click and drag to rotate the object.
  3. You can change the drawing style using the keys listed below.

Keyboard:
  P = Points
  W = Wireframe
  M = Materials (draw with textures, colours etc.)
  S = Toggle smooth/flat shading (without materials)
  D = Toggle use of display list(s)
  L = Load new 3DS object
  N = Draw normal vectors
  T = Draw as plain triangles using GetFace() method
ESC = Quit
